articles.title: Making the Transition from IT Support to Cybersecurity
articles.excerpt: Discover how my background in IT support provides a solid foundation for cybersecurity. Learn about the skills that transfer and what additional knowledge is needed.

articles.title: Essential Network Troubleshooting Techniques
articles.excerpt: A comprehensive guide to diagnosing and resolving common network issues. From basic connectivity problems to complex routing issues.

articles.title: Cloud Security Best Practices for Small Businesses
articles.excerpt: Essential security measures every organization should implement when moving to the cloud. Practical tips for Azure, AWS, and other cloud platforms.

articles.title: Incident Response: First Steps When Security Breaches Occur
articles.excerpt: A step-by-step guide to handling security incidents effectively. Learn the critical first actions that can minimize damage and preserve evidence.

articles.title: Building Technical Skills Through Real-World IT Support
articles.excerpt: How hands-on IT support experience builds problem-solving skills and technical expertise. Lessons learned from years of troubleshooting and user support.

articles.title: Understanding Network Security Fundamentals
articles.excerpt: An introduction to network security concepts including firewalls, VPNs, and intrusion detection. Essential knowledge for anyone working in IT or cybersecurity.

articles.title: Home Lab Setup for Cybersecurity Learning
articles.excerpt: Step-by-step guide to setting up your own cybersecurity lab at home. Learn how to create a safe environment for practicing penetration testing and security analysis.

articles.title: Common IT Support Scenarios and Security Implications
articles.excerpt: Real-world IT support scenarios and how they relate to cybersecurity. Understanding the security risks hidden in everyday support tasks.

articles.title: CompTIA Security+ Study Guide: Key Areas to Focus On
articles.excerpt: A focused study approach for the CompTIA Security+ certification. Based on real experience and practical application of security concepts.
